mil7.7.4:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘pavanassa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.7.4:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena paresam aparaddham khalitam paticchadetabbam na vivaritabbam.
mil7.7.4:1.4: Idam, maharaja, pavanassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.4:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pavanam sunnam pacurajanehi;
mil7.7.4:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ragadosamohamanaditthijalehi sabbehi ca kilesehi sunnena bhavitabbam.
mil7.7.4:2.3: Idam, maharaja, pavanassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.4:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pavanam vivittam janasambadharahitam;
mil7.7.4:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena papakehi akusalehi dhammehi anariyehi pavivittena bhavitabbam.
mil7.7.4:3.3: Idam, maharaja, pavanassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.4:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pavanam santam parisuddham;
mil7.7.4:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena santena parisuddhena bhavitabbam, nibbutena pahinamanena pahinamakkhena bhavitabbam.
mil7.7.4:4.3: Idam, maharaja, pavanassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.4:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ariyajanasamsevitena bhavitabbam.
mil7.7.4:5.3: Idam, maharaja, pavanassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
